title: Genius Doctor, Please Save My Dog! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Pets   Possessive Characters   Short Story
author: 今様
description:
Yu Tian and his childhood friend He Ming were not born to deal with each other. So far they maintained a friendship like plastic flower, thanks to their parents deep friendship.

He Ming opened a pet hospital after graduation and when the two of them were at odds with each other, Yu Tian called him ‘Dog Doctor’.

As a result, one day Yu Tian’s dog went on hunger strike.

He Ming: Beg me.

Yu Tian burst into tears: Genius Doctor, please save my dog.>
